Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: nissandeh dar rakhanevaale baagon aur sroton mein honge
pravesh karo inamen nirbhayataapoorvak salaamatee ke saath
unake seenon mein jo man-mutaav hoga use ham door kar denge. ve bhaee-bhaee banakar aamane-saamane takhton par honge
unhen vahaan na to koee thakaan aur takaleef pahunchegee aur na ve vahaan se kabhee nikaale hee jaenge
mere bandon ko soochit kar do ki main atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hoon
aur yah ki meree yaatana bhee atyant dukhadaayinee yaatana hai
aur unhen ibaraaheem ke atithiyon ka vrttaant sunao
jab ve usake yahaan aae aur unhonne salaam kiya to usane kaha, "hamen to tumase dar lag raha hai.
ve bole, "daro nahin, ham tumhen ek gyaanavaan putr kee shubh soochana dete hai.
usane kaha, "kya tum mujhe shubh soochana de rahe ho, is avastha mein ki mera budhaapa aa gaya hai? to ab mujhe kis baat kee shubh soochana de rahe ho
unhonne kaha, "ham tumhen sachchee shubh soochana de rahe hain, to tum niraash na ho
usane kaha, "apane rab kee dayaaluta se pathabhrashton ke siva aur kaun niraash hoga
usane kaha, "ai dooto, tum kis abhiyaan par aae ho
ve bole, "ham to ek aparaadhee qaum kee or bheje gae hai
sivaay loot ke gharavaalon ke. un sabako to ham bacha lenge
sivaay usakee patnee ke - hamane nishchit kar diya hai, vah to peechhe rah jaanevaalon mein rahengee.
